p.span: By submitting this form, I expressly consent and authorize ACCEL Schools to contact me at the number(s) provided via text or short message service (SMS) as well as by phone, regarding educational matters. I understand that these calls may be generated using automated technology and that message and data rates may apply, for which I will be solely financially responsible.

div.p: Now Enrolling Grades K-8 in Cleveland, Ohio

We are a tuition-free, public charter school serving K-8 scholars throughout the Cleveland area. We are AdvancED Accredited. Our school is conveniently located on Pearl Road in the heart of Old Brooklyn. Your child may be eligible for free bus transportation or RTA passes. At the time of Registration, please request a transportation form. Cleveland Preparatory Academy provides a safe and comprehensive scholastic environment that gives students a firm academic foundation, traditional and online learning, and collegiate readiness. Our mission is to mold productive global citizens by empowering them with a high-quality education, a spirit of exploration, and a lifelong love for learning.

h2.a: Last day of school for students
Last day of school for staff
Free Food Pantry at Cleveland Preparatory Academy!
